about_the_game: Want to get a great special rate on Platinum Bars to spend in Block N Load? This Platinum Pack DLC in a one-time purchase offer that will give you 560 Platinum to spend in game. Choose from heroes or skins and upgrade your in-game options today. (Please note that you can only purchase one copy of this DLC per Steam account and as per Steam guidelines regarding consumable content, this pack is not refundable. Further Platinum bar packages can be purchased in-game.)
detailed_description: Want to get a great special rate on Platinum Bars to spend in Block N Load? This Platinum Pack DLC in a one-time purchase offer that will give you 560 Platinum to spend in game. Choose from heroes or skins and upgrade your in-game options today. (Please note that you can only purchase one copy of this DLC per Steam account and as per Steam guidelines regarding consumable content, this pack is not refundable. Further Platinum bar packages can be purchased in-game.)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows Vista, 7 (SP1) & 8
  • Processor: Dual Core CPU 2.0 GHz (Intel Core 2 Duo or Athlon X2) or better
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated graphics card (NVidia GeForce 8800 GT or better)
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows Vista, 7 (SP1) & 8
  • Processor: Quad Core CPU 2.0 GHz (Core i5) or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated graphics card (GeForce GTX 650 / AMD Radeon HD 7770 series or better).
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection

short_description: Want to get a great special rate on Platinum Bars to spend in Block N Load? This Platinum Pack DLC will give you a one-time price for 560 Platinum to spend. Choose from heroes or skins and upgrade your in-game options today.
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian
*languages with full audio support
